functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Poison Tipped Arrow\",\"color\":\"dark_green\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"A rare imprint of arrows, effective","color":"gray"}','{"text":"at ensuring your target\'s demise.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Naturally, it was primarily used for","color":"gray"}','{"text":"murder in E\'Siraph.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Poison II","color":"gray"}']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:20,Amplifier:1,Duration:480,ShowParticles:0,Ambient:0},{Id:19,Amplifier:1,Duration:480,ShowParticles:1,Ambient:0}],CustomPotionColor:5399852,HideFlags:32}
